name: data
description: The data to be displayed in the table.

name: fields
description: The fields to be displayed as table headers.

name: disabled
description: The IDs of the rows that should be disabled.

name: dragDrop
description: Determines if the table supports dragging and dropping items onto rows.

name: hasHeader
description: Determines if the table has a header row.

name: headerPosition
description: The position of the sticky header.

name: highlighted
description: The IDs of the rows that should be highlighted.

name: hover
description: Determines if the table rows should have a hover effect.

name: idKey
description: The key to be used as the unique identifier for each row.

name: itemDomSelector
description: A function to get the dom selector for each item.

name: lazy
description: Determines if the table should be lazy loaded.

name: paddingX
description: The horizontal padding size of the table.

name: sortBy
description: The default field to sort by.

name: sticky
description: Determines if the table header should be sticky. This is helpful when it should still be visible when scrolling.
